name: Greenpath
description:
Protect the Tree of Life from the monsters and grow saplings to become stronger!

Press Space to shoot and Ctrl to grow saplings. Will you be the next defender of the forest?

  • Made for GoGodotJam 2021
  • Characters and assets art by Sharm
  • Trees art by Zabin
  • Main menu theme by Spring
  • Map theme by Hitctrl
  • Sounds from OpenGameArt
